mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(replyNo, boardNo, reply, replyer) values(seq_reply.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where replyNo = #{replyNo}
mapper.select: select boardNo, replyNo, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from (select /*+INDEX(tbl_reply idx_tbl_reply) */ rownum rn, boardNo, replyNo, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from tbl_reply where boardNo = #{boardNo} and replyNo > 0 and rownum <=#{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
select count(*) from tbl_reply where boardNo = #{boardNo}
